name: Habano Figurado
additionalNotes:
Figurado Cigars by Tony Alvarez are aged and have a mild creamy taste that includes sweet nuts, nutmeg, almond, and cedar undertones. The wrapper is a premium Habano shade-grown tobacco leaf. The binder and pure long filler are finely cured Cuban-seed Habano. Tony has been making fine cigars for years and these prove his talents. He supervises each roller in the creation of these Figurado cigars, and some are even made by the man himself. Each Figurado cigar is 4 inches long with a ring gauge of 50.
https://cccrafter.com/tony-alvarez-habano-figurado-4-x-50-cigars/
